content: After the CARIN connectathon wraps up, I think it'd be good for us to rename this stream to smart/health-cards as a home for implementer questions (and as a track home for the upcoming May HL7 connectathon). All old links to this track should keep working after the rename; let me know if anyone has concerns.

(@Neelima Karipineni FYI I captured this URL in the docs at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-05+SMART+Health+Cards+for+Vaccination+and+Testing; the URL points here now and will continue to point to this channel after the rename.)
@Josh Mandel as an Owner in this Zulip Org, you'll have to make the change. No issues with you doing so. Thanks for your support throughout the Connectathon!
